analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its performance.
insights: The homepage has the longest load time (430.8 ms) among the passed tests, which could be due to larger image sizes or more complex scripts. Analyze and optimize these elements to improve performance.
The blog page has the best TTFB (140.8 ms) and FCP (264.9 ms) among the passed tests. Use this page as a benchmark for optimizing other pages.
Ensure that all pages follow best practices for web performance, such as minifying CSS, JavaScript, and HTML files, optimizing images, and leveraging browser caching.
